body.p:
To his Excelency Beriah Magoffin Esqr
Govenor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky

Whereas John Robberts was indicted one at the May term of the owsley Circuit Court 1861 was tried and found guilty of carrying consealed deadly weapons to wit a pistol. ^one fined $50.^ your petitioners would respectfully state to your Excelency that he is avry pore man with a wife and several small children. owing to the scarsety of money and his poverty if the Collection of sd fine is forced he would be forced to go to prison for sd fine
now we your petitioner would respectfully request your Excellency to remit So much of Sd fine as your Excelency has the power to remit believing it is a case worthy of your Excelencys Clemency

John Bailey=
